scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Trinity. On the left, Christ, with wounds visible on his hands and side, is seated and draped in a red cloak, holding a golden staff. Above and between the figures, a white dove, symbolizing the Holy Spirit, is depicted in flight. On the right, God the Father, depicted as an elderly man with a beard and wearing a papal tiara and ornate robes, is seated and holding a globe. Both figures are surrounded by a radiant golden background, suggesting a divine and heavenly setting, with clouds depicted at the bottom. The composition is framed by architectural elements on the sides, suggesting a divine throne or celestial architecture.
